thread.title: Soundtrack to be released for Mitch Albom's new novel
thread.title_full: Soundtrack to be released for Mitch Albom's new novel

title: Soundtrack to be released for Mitch Albom's new novel
text:
> Entertainment Soundtrack to be released for Mitch Albom's new novel FILE - In this Nov. 7, 2013 file photo, author Mitch Albom is interviewed in Highland Park, Mich. HarperCollins Publishers announced Friday, Oct. 23, 2015 that a musical companion to Albom’s upcoming novel “The Magic Strings of Frankie Presto” will come out Nov. 6 through Republic Records, four days ahead of the book’s release. (AP Photo/Carlos Osorio, File) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
